Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: CHIVES
teams.loan_because:
" The earth is one country and mankind it's citizens."

We loan because we care about others and want to help them 

We loan because we don't think it's fair how we get to do what we want but some people don't have those choices.

We loan because want to be empowered and empower others. 

We loan because we think all people should have an even chance for anything.

We loan because  we think that when one is affected, everyone is affected and we want to fix that.

We loan because a small sacrifice can make a very big difference on somebody's life.
teams.description: Wanting to make a difference and empower the lives of all people across the globe, to transform society into a better place for all

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Denmark
teams.loan_because:
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood. 
(Article 1  of United Nations Declaration of Human Rights)
teams.description:
Team for everyone in Denmark, who are taking part of this great opportunity to improve the world one step at a time.

Use this to recruite friends. http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Location: HeartMath Denmark
Street: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 floor , 1202 Copenhagen K

More Info:: Facebook-group: Kiva Denmark  link: http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gruppen her er for alle i Danmark, der støtter denne fantastiske ide om at hjælpe verden ét skridt af gangen.

Vil du hjælpe: Inviter venner - fortæl om Kiva 
http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Kiva Denmark holder møder om hvad vi kan gøre for at udbrede kendskabet til denne unikke måde at hjælpe på. Kontakt: Kristine.flagstad@uni-c.dk hvis du har nogen ideer eller skriv en meddelelse her til gruppen.

Næste møde holdes hos: HeartMath Danmark
Adresse: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 sal, 1202 Copenhagen K
Dato: Ikke fastlagt pt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Se evt. mere på facebook gruppen : http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Solar Explosion
teams.loan_because: 1.5 billion people still lack electricity. Only a global solar explosion can change that and end poverty.
teams.description: We know if you really want to fight poverty, you start with distributed renewable power – harnessing the sun in your own backyard! Micro-solar technology already exists that can transform people’s lives. The problem is that banks are only financing the old model: centralized power stations and expensive transmission grids. We lend to inspire awareness, so microfinance does more and more solar financing projects. Our goal is a solar explosion! Join us today!

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth.

teams.name: Wind Power Now
teams.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.
teams.description: Wind power today for a better tomorrow.  Wind power emits no greenhouse gases, no air pollution and no water pollution and it uses no water.  It requires no mining or drilling for fuel, and it produces no hazardous waste. It is a tremendous rural development tool.  For more info, see http://www.yes2wind.com , a Web site on wind created by Friends of the Earth, Greenpeace and the World Wildlife Fund.

Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: Holy Cow! - High-Impact Loan Lenders
teams.loan_because: We want to make the largest impact that can be made with a microloan. High-Impact Loan Lenders was formed to share news of the availability of great loans with other lenders. It is expected that lenders will continue to credit loans to other teams.
teams.description:
Pretty much every loan on Kiva is a good loan. At High-Impact Loan Lenders, we are interested in the very best loans.

It's hard to define an exact criteria for the loans in which we are interested, but there will not be very many of them. We look for loans that practically make us jump out of our chair and exclaim "Holy cow! What a great loan!" If a loan is so good that it makes you say "Forget about the budget -- I have 25 bucks for THAT loan!" it is a loan in which we would be interested. Looking at the loans that we've supported will give you an idea of the loans that we like.

teams.name: Becky's Hugs
teams.loan_because: Becky was unfailingly generous during her short life (2001-2010).  She loved freely and without limit, and never met anyone she considered to be a stranger.  She was always ready with a hug for anyone who needed one, even when they didn't know it yet.  Loaning Becky's memory keeps her love alive, spreading her love around the world!
teams.description:
We are a group of people who have been inspired by the love of a young lady named Becky, who was tragically killed 30 August 2010 at the age of 9½.  She loved unconditionally, and was always ready with a hug, even for complete strangers.  The living memorial of sharing hugs began immediately after her death, when her mother told her classmates to hug each other every day in her memory.  This team keeps Becky's love alive by sharing her hugs in the form of loans around the world.

To learn more about Becky and the impact of her short life, visit BeckysHugs.com, which will point you to the Becky's Hugs page on Facebook.  Look at the photos and videos to get a better idea about who Becky was, and check out the timeline to see the ways in which people have celebrated her memory and love.

Hugs to you!

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Lippe lends out
teams.loan_because: It might help.
teams.description:
We are based in, originally from or just friends of Lippe, a beautiful hilly countryside in northwestern Germany between Teutoburg Forest and river Weser.

The region is known for the Hermann-monument near Detmold, the mysterious "Externsteine" (an ice-age rock formation) and odd dishes like Pickert with liverwurst.

Lippe has been an individual state for centuries but after the abdication of the last prince in 1918 we became a free state and finally joined the german federal state of North Rhine-Westphalia as it's 3rd part.

Everyone is welcome, our message board can be used in english and german as well.

Na denn man jö... "Lend, Lipper-Land..."

teams.name: Polska-Poland-Pologne-Polonia
teams.description:
Czesc !  Jak sie masz?

Welcome  to our  POLISH TEAM!
"Polacy" of all countries…UNITE!  
It is time to join a Kiva revolution! 
 (...and make a small contribution while visiting this page, too ;- )


Ok , if you are POLISH , "POLISH wannabe", POLISH sympathizer  (or even... a hater :-) and you are  willing to help others to help themselves: you definitely came to the right place! 
Join US!
Together we can make a difference!

Thank you for your interest in our team and have a lovely day!

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: RoBo 3D
teams.loan_because:
We started on a dining room table building our first product out of scraps of wood and parts we found online. 

We know what it takes to build a product from scratch and through crowdfunding, we were able to get the funds necessary to build our business.
 
It is always nice to have people believe in what you do and want to support it. This is our opportunity to support others and to help people around the world who work hard to build their businesses, create great opportunities in their communities, and put everything on the line to provide for their families.
teams.description: We build 3D printers so people can use them to build their own creations. It's a chain of imagination and creativity that is spreading around the world.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds
